game.title: Escape from Elyria
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Elyria lies shattered and broken. Players take on the role of a novice mage who possesses an ancient power that could restore magic to the world. As they journey across the continent, they must uncover the secrets behind their abilities and confront the dark forces that seek to exploit them.
game.beginning: The game begins in the small village of Willowdale, where players are tasked with finding a rare herb needed for a magical potion. Their mentor, a wise old wizard, has gone missing, and they must venture into the nearby forest to find him.
game.ending: With magic restored to the world, players face off against the dark sorcerer who had stolen it in the first place. In a final showdown, they harness their newfound powers to defeat the sorcerer and shatter his magical shield, restoring balance to the land of Elyria.
